creator: C.M & Co Solutions LTD
descriptionHtml:
From your phone to your doorstep.

Avocado delivers groceries in minutes!

Avocado is an online app offering the fastest shopping & delivery services in Nigeria, with a variety of restaurants, groceries, retail store options, and more.

All Grocery and supermarket needs will be delivered to your doorstep through the Avocado grocery delivery application, shop your home needs from wherever you are, and don’t get more crowd hassles.

Why Avocado?

~ Super-fast Delivery: Ordering is super easy—tap on your favorite supermarket, add items to your bag, and checkout. We pack your order and deliver it straight to you within minutes!

~ Easy Payment: Pay easily using all major credit cards (Visa, Verve, and MasterCard)

~ Store Prices: You get to shop from your favorite supermarkets on Avocado at the exact prices available in-store

~ Track your delivery in real-time

~ Save and name different delivery addresses

HOW DOES IT WORK?

1. Download our App
2. Click on your favorite supermarket
3. Add your favorite products to the cart
4. Place your order
5. Enjoy groceries at your door in minutes
descriptionShort: Online shopping app, offering fastest shopping & delivery services in Nigeria.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
-> Fix Global Search issues
-> Updated homescreen card display for android
-> Suspended price indicator now same as the bag
-> Fix flickering behavior on product list screen
-> Added Stories UI
-> Fixed Search information in supermarket
-> Added Network error screen
-> Introduced Fulfillment Center
